verses.name: Luke 10:13
verses.text: Woe unto thee, Chorazin! woe unto thee, Bethsaida! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon, which have been done in you, they had a great while ago repented, sitting in sackcloth and ashes.

verses.name: Luke 10:14
verses.text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment, than for you.

verses.name: Luke 10:15
verses.text: And thou, Capernaum, which art exalted to heaven, shalt be thrust down to hell.

verses.name: Luke 10:16
verses.text: He that heareth you heareth me; and he that despiseth you despiseth me; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me.
